title.description: Blue, centered title at the top.

score.description: Numeric score representing the user's alcohol intake.

Type.description: Primary dropdown to select drink type.

Size.description: Secondary dropdown that updates based on 'Type' selection, showing relevant drink sizes.

Strength.description: Tertiary dropdown that updates based on 'Type' to show alcohol strengths.

Dropdown.behavior: Sequentially linked dropdowns; selecting a 'Type' populates 'Size', and so forth.

QuickSelections.description: One-click options below dropdowns for common drink choices. Selecting these will bypass the dropdowns and update the score immediately.

successNotification.description: Toast notification after a drink addition.

useCaseScenario: Anna opens the app, quickly selects '5oz, 12%' button. Score updates and a notification appears.
